name: The Wanderer (enfluensa)
description:
The Wanderer is a storybook game for eevee's Games Made Quick 1½.  It's heavily inspired by Vagabond's Quest, Lone Wolf games, and anything by Telltale Games.

This game uses your browser's local storage to save your state, so if you clear that or play in your browser's private mode, progress will not be saved.

Source code: here.
